message:
I  am wondering how does truecaller database work ?

I mean if x people save me with x distinct names which name would it use ?

data.message:
I don't think any of us actually knows the logic behind their system but I would assume it would :
1. Use the first entry/mention of the name/number combination 
2. Keep looking for matches and if a new name is being used multiple times for that specific number it would use that instead.

So I would assume it would use the first name it gets, then the most common name that people use, and if both names are mentioned for equal number of times it would use the oldest/newest based on how they designed it.
I guess it would be something close to what you said :D
Saves the first entry until u register  your number yourself.
